Name: Eat Colors
About the game: Gameplay Eat Colors is a precision platform game, where instead of running and jumping you throw yourself from surface to surface using just the mouse and a fluffy slime that sticks anywhere. Mechanics Also instead of having a life bar you have a death bar, it increases while you are not moving and resets with every jump, but jumping in the same place or trying from very distant jumps can kill you. THINK, AIM AND JUMP.... Don't let your slime die Objective Your objective in the game is to restore the colors of the world (RGB) by eating the colored apples and for that you will face several challenges, including boss battles. Features of the game: Challenging Gameplay Beautiful pixel art Three stages of scenarios Various mechanics Battle against Bosses Cute Slime Epilepsy danger: if you have epilepsy mode enabled in the options
